option.od: print the help message and exit.
print the RST version number and exit.
filename of the grdmap format file. If this is omitted, the file will be read from standard input.
the input file is a grd format file.

synopsis.p: Supersample a grid format file in time.

description.p: Supersample a grid format file in time.
The task supersamples by skipping over records in the output file for a fixed length of time. By default the task will write a record every 10 minutes

example.description: Supersample the grd format file "20040830.grd" to produce the file "20040830.grd.s".
